events.description: Player #10 passes the ball into the penalty box. Player #30 attempts a header toward the goal.
Bastian Schweinsteiger scores with a header into the right side of the goal. Crowd cheers. Rafinha (13) celebrates with Schweinsteiger.
A replay of the celebration by Bastian Schweinsteiger after the goal. The crowd continues to cheer loudly.
Bayern Munich players including Arjen Robben (#10), and Bastian Schweinsteiger celebrate together after the goal, hugging and patting each other on the back.
Two coaches are watching the game from the bench. Coach Pep Guardiola is standing and discussing the game with another coach sitting by him.
Bastian Schweinsteiger along with David Alaba and Mario Mandzukic celebrate a goal. David Alaba raises his hand to celebrate while Bastian Schweinsteiger and Mario Mandzukic hug him.

Bayern Munich is on the attack. Player #7 dribbles past multiple Manchester United defenders. Arjen Robben takes a shot from just inside the penalty box, but it's saved by the Manchester United goalkeeper David de Gea .
Replay of a shot by Arjen Robben saved by Manchester United goalkeeper David de Gea .
Marouane Fellaini heads a ball away from the Bayern Munich attack.
Player #31 heads the ball towards the goal inside the penalty box. The goalkeeper dives to his right and attempts to save the ball, but the ball goes into the net.
Replay of various football-related highlights and promotions including 'GREAT GOALS', 'CLASSIC MATCHES', 'LEGENDARY PLAYERS', 'STAR CHALLENGES', 'BEHIND THE SCENES' and the URL 'More From UEFA.tv'.
